remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是允许的控件的排列子元素，水平和垂直两个位置相对于停靠容器和容器内的其他元素的边界。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 默认值为 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，表示支持的控件的当前停靠位置获取值。In the following example, a value is obtained representing the current dock position for a control that supports .
